description: exp/template/html: check that modified nodes are not shared by templates

http://codereview.appspot.com/5012044/diff/3/src/pkg/exp/template/html/escape.go
File src/pkg/exp/template/html/escape.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5012044/diff/3/src/pkg/exp/template/html/escape.go#newcode183
src/pkg/exp/template/html/escape.go:183: panic(fmt.Sprintf("node %s shared between templates with %v", n))
I'd drop the "with %v", since there's no corresponding argument.

Done.
